name: Despillar
description:
What is this thing?

Despillar is a very simple destruction toy I made to pass the time without a proper computer.  You can place objects and shoot bullets at them and they will (usually) crumble and explode in a nice way.

Please note that this is just a toy made in a day to pass the time, and it is not intended to be a fully fledged game.

I made it to test cell fracture and particle effects :)

Controls:

Left click - Shoot bullet straight forward

Right click - Move camera

1-6 - Spawn objects at mouse pointer (rotated towards you)

What wilI do with it?

1. Make the object spawning a bit sensible
2. Make the player physical, so you can parkour on the world you just destroyed!
3. Make some more levels, maybe expand the world
4. Add objects and features depending on feedback!
5. Maybe, just maybe, make a game out of this, something like angry birds or some parkour idea.
